events.title: US company with access to biggest telecom firms uncovers breach by nation-state hackers
events.summary: A U.S. telecom services provider, Ribbon Communications, discovered a breach by a nation-state actor; access was undetected for nearly a year, with implications for global telecom supply-chains. :contentReference[oaicite:0]{index=0}

events.title: Former Trenchant exec pleads guilty to selling cyber exploits to Russian broker
events.summary: A former executive at the U.S. defense contractor pleaded guilty to transferring protected cyber-exploit software to a Russian broker supplying government-linked customers. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}

events.title: Critical Authentication Bypass Vulnerability in Healthcare Vendor Exposes Databases — H-ISAC daily alert
events.summary: H-ISAC daily cyber headlines report a critical authentication-bypass vulnerability in healthcare vendor mMedica exposing databases, as well as large scale smishing campaign leveraging 194,000 domains. :contentReference[oaicite:2]{index=2}

events.title: Russia, China Will Weaponize UN Cyber Treaty, FDD Warns
events.summary: The Foundation for Defense of Democracies warns that a new U.N. cyber-crime treaty could be used by Russia and China to legitimize digital repression and shape internet governance in their favour. :contentReference[oaicite:3]{index=3}

events.title: Trump directs Pentagon to match Russia and China in nuclear weapons testing
events.summary: US President orders the Pentagon to develop parallel capabilities after Russian nuclear-powered weapons tests — cyber dimension expected to escalate alongside conventional arms. :contentReference[oaicite:4]{index=4}
